null: Course Title: Creating Stunning Digital Graphics with Canva
Organization: INNOHAT TRAINING PTE. LTD.
Learning Outcomes
LO1 - Develop visual communication projects in Canva, blending typography with media elements.
LO2 – Create Canva storyboards to communicate visual intention to team members and evaluate designs to suggest visual enhancements.
LO3 – Develop strategies for Canva designs, critiquing and collaborating to improve visual communication based on best practices.
Duration: 3 days (16 hrs),
Instructional methods: Lecture (11 hrs), Didactic Questioning, Demonstration, Practical (11 hrs)
Assessment method: 1 hr WA-SAQ, 1 hr (PP)
TSC – Visual Communication DSN-COM-4005-1.1
TSC Knowledge
K1: Elements of typography, logos, other visual communication design, and information design
K2: Best practices in visual communication
K3: Uses of relevant design software packages
K4: Colour fundamentals and forms
K5: Techniques for analysing aesthetics
TSC Ability
A1: Initiate visual communication ideas through exploration
A2: Develop visual communication outputs by integrating media, materials, processes and environment
A3: Create storyboards and task flow designs to communicate visual intentions to team members
A4: Evaluate the design work of stakeholders
A5: Propose suggestions to enhance the visual formats of designs
A6: Critique own work or work with others to enhance visual communication outputs
A7: Develop strategies to enhance the appeal of visual communication outputs
TSC Mapping
Learning Units
LU1: Fundamentals of Design with Canva (: Topic 1: Introduction to Canva and Basic Design Principles (A1, K1, K3)
Principles of typography and logo design
Experimenting with Canva's text and image tools
Topic 2: Colour and Form in Canva Design (A2, K4)
Fundamentals of colour theory and application
Exploring colour schemes and palettes in Canva
The role of forms and shapes in design
Practical exercises on colour and form harmonization
Designing for different environments and contexts
LU2: Advanced Visual Communication in Ca: Topic 3: Storyboarding and Flow Design in Canva (A3, K5)
Developing task flows for visual projects
Utilizing Canva for ideation and conceptualization
Case studies of effective storyboard designs
Topic 4: Best Practices and Aesthetic Analysis in Canva (A4, A5)
Understanding and applying design best practices
Techniques for aesthetic and functional analysis
Workshop on designing with user experience in mind
Group activities for peer review and feedback
LU3: Enhancing and Strategizing Visual C: Topic 5: Critical Review and Enhancement Strategies in Canva (A6, K2)
Workshops on enhancing existing Canva designs
Topic 6: Innovative Approaches to Design in Canva (A7, K2)
Exploring advanced features and tools in Canva
Case studies of successful visual communication
